name: Chocolate Hazelnut Fudge Bars. Vegan Freezer Fudge Recipe
description: These freezer Chocolate Hazelnut Fudge Bars are super easy and satisfy the sweet and chocolate tooth immediately. Vegan Nutella fudge. Makes a 9 by 5 inch loaf pan
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup coconut milk or other non dairy milk
1.5 oz vegan dark chocolate (1/3 to 1/2 cup)

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the dates in warm water for 10 to 15 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the dates in warm water for 10 to 15 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat coconut milk until almost hot then take off heat. Add chocolate and let sit for half a minute, then whisk to melt.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat coconut milk until almost hot then take off heat. Add chocolate and let sit for half a minute, then whisk to melt.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the melted chocolate, nut butter, vanilla, dates until smooth. Taste and adjust sweet, chocolate etc. Blend well. Pour into parchment lined pan. Freeze for 2 hours. Slice and serve or slice and freeze in airtight container.
